name: Big Umbrella Design Studios
overview:
First and foremost, Big Umbrella Design Studios is a service design company. We help our customers to conceptualize, design, brand and package the services needed by their businesses. We have no qualms of the domain the project will take us to, the tools we need to learn, language we need to be familiar and of course the environment we need to weather.

We say, we follow the beaten-to-death design processes (like other design studios), yet retain the essence of our uniqueness of design and delivery.

Here are things we do:

We design websites. We design user interfaces for mobile, software application, television and web. We do market research & user research. We do usability testing. We conceptualize a new service/product for you. We create visual identity, lauch strategy and complete marketing campaign for you. We design rapid prototypes for you.
